Text:
John Smith, super elite agent. Clad in a suit and
a white mask obscuring the upper half of his
face, he is the alter ego Cid adopted during his time
in the Snow Fox Corporation.
At least, it was supposed to be an alter ego...
My lord, might I have a moment of your time?
What is it?

Well...how long do you intend to wear that mask and
suit?

I haven't decided. But I'm going to dress this way
for the time being.
Oh...my lord, that saddens me.

Master Shadow, leader of the Shadow Garden, wearing a
suit made by the Snow Fox Corporation!

If I may speak freely, you do know that suit is a
knock-off of Mitsugoshi's own designs, yes?!
I know.

Then why... No, forgive my outburst. There is always
a deeper purpose behind your actions... I seem to
have forgotten this.

Regardless, my pride as a retailer will not allow me
to be upstaged by some cheap imitation! Thus, I have
prepared replacements for you, my lord!

Though not made of slime, they have been tailored
from the most painstakingly-selected fabrics so as to
be worthy of your noble personage. Please accept
them!
...Why are you doing this?

Please forgive my brazenness for acting without
consulting you first.

I do this simply because I know we at Mitsugoshi can
provide you with apparel of drastically superior
quality along with much more refined styling options!
Hmm...
(I'm fine with a knock-off, honestly...)

(But if I can get posh suits from Mitsugoshi for
free...then maybe it's a pretty good deal.)
Fine. Let's have a look at these suits.

Yes, my lord! Give me a just moment! I shall have
them brought out for you at once, so please select
whichever suits your taste!
Thank you for waiting, my lord.

Gamma returns with her subordinates. Before her is an
array of suits arranged with complete ensembles that
include neckties, pins, and shoes.

Are any of these to your liking, my lord? Please,
touch them and see what you think.
Well...
(Every single bit of this stuff is way too flashy!)

(I'd look like the toastmaster at some party instead
of a secret agent! Or like some cheesy entertainer!)

This suit here makes extensive use of brilliant gold
embroidery to depict your solemnity, my lord. Each
and every thread was sewn by hand by master artisans.
...Hmm.

Special attention was given to the fabric of the suit
beside it, which, after much trial and error, was
successfully produced in a lustrous purple. A royal
hue fitting for one of your noble bearing, my lord.
...I see.

A discerning eye was applied not only to the
materials, but also to the accompanying items for the
suits. Do any of them strike your fancy?
None of these are any good.
What?! M-May I ask why?

Someone out there probably likes this kind of stuff.
But not me.

(I'm trying to be a super elite agent here... I need
her to give me something more...stylish and slick!)

(I dunno if she'll get what I'm after, though...
C'mon, Gamma! Flex those fashion muscles for me!)
Then...how about this one here?

The dragon embroidered on the back lets all who see
it know that the wearer is a person of unparalleled
sagacity!
The eyes are gems?

Yes! This is a first-class garment of the finest
quality!
I'll pass.
B-But...!
Nothing here is what I'm looking for.

I'm fine as I am now. But if you really want me to
wear a Mitsugoshi suit, you need to design something
that has the ambience I want.
The ambience you want...? Please enlighten me.

What I seek is a suit made for a professional killer,
a man of few words who completes his missions without
flaw and never boasts of his work to others.

Understood. On the honor of the Mitsugoshi Company,
and my name as Gamma...

I swear I shall deliver as suit that is just as you
desire!
Good, I know you will.
Y-Yes, my lord!

A man of few words, a professional killer who
completes his missions without flaw!

...Ahh, I see it now. I shall return before you know
it, my lord.
Heh... Oh you do, hm? Then I'll wait a while longer.

Gamma leaves, only to return in short order with a
mannequin with a cloth draped over it

I did not bring this ensemble out earlier because I
felt it lacked the glamor of the others.

But, after being reminded of your wishes, I came to
the decision that this truly is the only option!
...Voila!
Wow...!
...This is superb.
Y-You truly think so?!

(Yep, now we're talkin'. This screams super elite
agent.)
...Can I try it on?
Yes, by all means!

Cid approaches the mannequin to inspect the suit up
close.

Whoa, not a bad silhouette, either. In fact, I'd say
this is a fine display of careful workmanshi

(The pattern on the necktie, the logo on the
breastWait, is that the same thing done super fine
on the shirt, too?)

Ah, so you've noticed! This suit and its accompanying
accessories all share something in common. That's
right

They all bear the outline of you, Master Shadow, upon
them!
Ah. Rejected.
What?! But why?!

(C'mon, who wants to wear clothes decorated with
their own image?)

(...Welp, looks like I'm going with the knock-off for
now.)

Cid nods and decides to keep John Smith dressed as he
is, ignoring Gamma as she desperately pleads the case
for her "Master Shadow silhouette" design...
